name: Spin the World (itch)
description:
[Spin the World] Help the bunny get to the goal by spinning the world.

For Kenney Jam 2021 (Theme: Rotation)

[Objective]: Get to the goal  to complete the level.
[Controls]: Using the mouse, left-click and drag to rotate the world.

The bunny will always try to walk forward and will turn around if he encounters a wall.
Collect the key  to unlock blocks with keyholes 
Collect the gem  to get 100% completion for the level 

There are 9 levels. Try to 100% all 9 levels.

All art assets are by Kenney
Music, SFX, Programming by me ( https://eazypeasy.itch.io/ )

Software used:
Unity
MuLab (music)
SFXR (sound effects)
GIMP (for some color adjustments)
